item.title: Problem with scripting a safe zone
item.dc:creator: @lukenuke75 lukenuke75
item.description:
@lukenuke75 wrote:

i am trying to make a non safe zone and i created all the booleans etc and put the coords in and its still not working if you can help heres my code:

Code:

public boolean nonsafe() { if ((absX >= 3350 && absX <= 3357 && absY >= 3404 && absY <= 3412) || (absX >= 3350 && absX <= 3357 && absY >= 3404 && absY <= 3412) ||heightLevel ==1){ return true; }else{ return false; } }
